SELECT C_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO C_BOARD (C_NO, NICKNAME, C_TITLE, C_CONTENT, C_CREATE_DATE, C_MODIFY_DATE, C_HIT, C_IP) VALUES (#{cNo}, #{nickname}, #{cTitle}, #{cContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, #{cIp})
mapper.select: SELECT C_NO as cNo, U.NICKNAME as nickname, C_TITLE as cTitle, C_CONTENT as cContent, C_CREATE_DATE as cCreateDate, C_MODIFY_DATE as cModifyDate, C_HIT as cHit, C_IP as cIp FROM USERS U INNER JOIN C_BOARD C ON U.NICKNAME = C.NICKNAME WHERE C.C_NO = #{cNo}

SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.C_NO, A.NICKNAME, A.C_TITLE, A.C_CONTENT, A.C_CREATE_DATE, A.C_MODIFY_DATE, A.C_HIT, A.C_IP, CASE WHEN A.C_CREATE_DATE >= SYSDATE-7 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as NEW_YN FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY C_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM, B.C_NO, B.NICKNAME, B.C_TITLE, B.C_CONTENT, B.C_CREATE_DATE, B.C_MODIFY_DATE, B.C_HIT, B.C_IP, U.USER_NO, U.ID, U.NAME FROM USERS U INNER JOIN C_BOARD B ON U.NICKNAME = B.NICKNAME) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
